channel.title: How do i make an item worth 300m?
channel.description:
Hey :) I would like to make my red phats worth about.. 300m, but I dont know how to do more then like 9999999gp.
If I put another digit the whole section in item.cfg moves over, then in-game it says it's still just 1gp o.O
I use PI and I would like some help :(
(I think you have to use decimals somehow, but I dont understand how :\)
